description.value:
Immediately allows patients to reroll any failed Tests to resist disease or toxins and stops Blood Loss. However also must make a Toughness Test or take 1d5 Damage that ignores Armour and Toughness. An all in one injection of anti-baterials, blood-clotting agents, allergens, poison and radiation boosters, white blood cell stimulators, and a sedative.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 75 T
